alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 21 at 2:46PM MDT until October 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND SATURDAY... Gusty westerly winds along with very dry conditions will continue this afternoon with elevated to critical fire weather conditions already observed across most of the area. Dry and breezy weather is forecast again on Saturday across the plains, where critical conditions are again possible. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MORGAN AND SOUTHERN WELD COUNTIES... FIRE ZONES 243 AND 244... The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 243 and 244. * Timing...From 11 AM Saturday until 7 PM Saturday evening. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Morgan County
